actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to reduce the regulatory burdens and authorize the waiver of licensing requirements with respect to certain non-Federal hydroelectric power projects.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Power Act to authorize the Federal Power Commission to waive licensing requirements connected with a permit, license, or exemption for an existing or proposed water project with a total installed capacity, upon completion, of 15 megawatts or less.

titles.title: A bill to reduce the regulatory burdens and authorize the waiver of licensing requirements with respect to certain non-Federal hydroelectric power projects.
